isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - INJECTOR DRIVE MODULE (IDM) POWER SUPPLY - BEFORE TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: BEFORE TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: Before Performing the test(s) included in this section:

step1.para: Make sure batteries are fully charged! Check battery cables and grounds for clean, tight connections free of damage and corrosion. Voltage tests will give inaccurate readings if batteries are not fully charged.

Inspect connectors for pushed back, loose or damaged (spread or bent) terminals, or wires with cut strands, etc. the wires and connections must be free of damage or corrosion. When some connectors corrode, a light white residue is present that must be removed.
Inspect suspect circuit grounds for clean, tight connections, free of damage.
